title: Top selling Nintendo Switch games worldwide in 2019
summary: This chart shows the Top selling Nintendo in the Switch competirion .
\\n From the chart we see that the Pokémon:_Let's_Go_Pikachu!/_Pokémon:_Let's_Go_Eevee! Month made the Top million by some margin , with only 3.13 .

Super_Smash_Bros._Ultimate and Mario_Kart_8_Deluxe made a respectable 15.71 and 19.01 million , with The_Legend_of_Zelda:_Link's_Awakening and The_Legend_of_Zelda:__Breath_of_the_Wild not far behind , at 3.13 and 14.54 respectively .

gold: This statistic shows the top selling Nintendo Switch titles worldwide as of September 2019 . With 19.01 million units sold , Mario Kart 8 Deluxe was the top selling Nintendo Switch game as of September 2019 .
